question: The union government planned to develop the Green Airports in __________.
explanation: Union Government launched green airports, two airports in Andhra Pradesh. Airport Authority of India (AAI) commenced installation of the 1MegaWatt solar power plant at Tirupathi and Vijayawada Airports. The basic capacity of installed solar power plants at 29 airports/locations with a total capacity of 12.84 MWp.
